DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the safety and efficacy of sitagliptin 100mg compared to sitagliptin 200mg in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Sitagliptin Dose Comparison Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-0431-077)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patient has Type 2 Diabetes Patient is between the ages of 3065 years Patient is not on an antihyperglycemic agent (AHA) (glycosylated hemoglobin [A1C] 710% ), or is on oral single AHA or lowdose combination therapy (A1C 6.59.5%). Patient has Type 1 Diabetes Patient has been treated with sitagliptin, vildagliptin, or other similar drugs or has been treated with exenatide in the past 3 months Patient has taken insulin within the past 3 months
